original_prompt: Build a lightweight NEAR launch co-pilot that turns one product idea into MVP scope, execution plan, and go-to-market checklist.
interpretation: A zero-backend web prototype that autonomously converts a one-sentence NEAR product idea into a build-ready brief with MVP scope, execution timeline, and practical risks.
features_implemented: One-sentence input to structured prototype plan generation
Autonomous idea interpretation and target-audience inference
JSON export and Markdown copy for handoff
Local history of recent prompts in browser storage
